DOC.brief_summary: Title : Inter-rater reliability reflux find score base endoscopic laryngeal finding diagnosis laryngopharyngeal reflux disease Participants : Voluntary participant invitation among member ( total 40 gastroenterologist ) Gangwon Branch Korean Society Gastrointestinal Endoscopy otorhinolaryngologist Primary endpoint : Interrater reliability ( Kappa coefficient ) sum reflux find score 7 point otorhinolaryngologist gastroenterologist ( 7 point mean cut-off value diagnosis laryngopharyngeal reflux disease ) Secondary endpoint : Agreement ( % ) 8 item reflux find score laryngopharygeal reflux among gastroenterologist
DOC.brief_title: Inter-rater Reliability Reflux Finding Score Among Gastroenterologists
DOC.detailed_description: Study Design 1 . Recruitment doctor participant : introduction e-mail 2 . Education reflux find score - standardize material ( instructional video ) 3 . PRETEST ( 15 picture ) / feedback ( at-a-glance assessment format ) 4 . TEST 1 ( 50 picture ) - Acess format include 8 item picture 5 . Feedback education ( individualized intruction otorhinolaryngologist ) 6 . TEST 2 ( 50 picture ) - Acess format include 8 item picture 7 . Test-Retest reliability - repeat Test 2 1 week interval ( Participants take retest TEST 2 concealment answer ) 8 . Analysis
DOC.criteria: Participants : Gastroenterologists ( GI specialist ) trainee / Pictures : Endoscopic laryngeal picture good quality Participants : Major gastroenterology / Pictures : Endoscopic laryngeal picture without good quality
